medical_history.chief_complaint: Sudden onset of right-sided pleuritic chest pain and shortness of breath.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms developed while riding a stationary bicycle with a gradual increase in shortness of breath over several years.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of aspiration 10 years earlier while sucking on cooked chicken vertebrae.
medical_history.social_history: Heavy alcohol consumption may have been a factor.
